history.proof: intros l target. induction l. - simpl. apply AAO_nil. - destruct a. + destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l). * simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: AAO_IO. * destruct (in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target). simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: AAO_IU,AAO_IO. simpl. apply AAO_I_dorp; auto. hauto q: on depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} k : K l : list op target : list IR IHl : acknowledge_all_ops l (acknowledge_all_ops_func l target) a : acknowledged_op k l Unable to unify "acknowledge_all_ops (I ?M1688 :: ?M1689) (IRI ?M1688 :: ?M1690)" with "acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: l) (if acknowledged_op_dec k l then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else acknowledge_all_ops_func l target)".

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} k : K l : list op target : list IR IHl : acknowledge_all_ops l (acknowledge_all_ops_func l target) n : ~ acknowledged_op k l i : In (IRU k) target Unable to unify "acknowledge_all_ops (I ?M1954 :: ?M1955) (IRI ?M1954 :: IRU ?M1954 :: ?M1956)" with "acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: l) (if acknowledged_op_dec k l then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else acknowledge_all_ops_func l target)".

original: intros l target. induction l. - simpl. apply AAO_nil. - destruct a. + destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l). * simpl. apply AAO_IO; auto. * destruct (in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target). { simpl. apply AAO_IU; auto. } { simpl. apply AAO_I_dorp; auto. } + simpl. apply AAO_O; auto.
